greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = A250470(2*n - 1).
comment: For n > 1, a(n) tells which number is located immediately above n in the sieve of Eratosthenes (see A083140, A083221) in the same column of the sieve that contains 2n - 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
xref: Odd bisection of A250470. The other bisection: A250479.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 06 2014
